title: Fish pie with soufflé crouton topping
description: A classic pie of fish in white sauce, topped with a simple bread and soufflé style topping.Equipment: You will need a 1.5 litre/2½ pint shallow, wide-based, ovenproof dish.
ingredients: 350g/12oz fresh haddock, skinned and cut into evenly sized cubes
350g/12oz undyed smoked haddock, skinned and cut into evenly sized cubes
3 hard-boiled eggs, each cut into 4 or 8 wedges
1 small (400g/14oz) loaf white bread (about 2-3 days old)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
